alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 9:40PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rusk and northeastern Chippewa Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 940 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weyerhaeuser, or 16 miles southeast of Rice Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bruce around 950 PM CDT. Ladysmith around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sheldon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern and west central Wisconsin.
